text: To avoid bias, diet allocation was concealed from study personnel until after consent was obtained. Patients were blinded to their diet assignment in that they were not told explicitly if their assigned diet was in accordance with ND or FSGs.
sentences: To avoid bias, diet allocation was concealed from study personnel until after consent was obtained.
Patients were blinded to their diet assignment in that they were not told explicitly if their assigned diet was in accordance with ND or FSGs.
